Vigilance

99CW Steelsuit Adept crews vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one artifact or colorless creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Perfection is imperative within Kaila's inner circle.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Pedigree Collector enters, create a 1/1 white Dog creature token.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“What kind of question is that? How am I [/i]ever[i] supposed to pick a favourite?”[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]United –[/i] Whenever this creature attacks with two or more tokens, it gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Vigilance

cards.flavor_text: [i]“No one's watching, and if they are, they sure as hell don't care.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, if it's not your combat phase, Aerial Enforcer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

When Mournful Matriarch dies, choose one –
• Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token. You gain 1 life.
• Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Extort [i](Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)[/i]
When Zaila's Willbender enters, exile target nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less until Zaila's Willbender leaves the battlefield.

Flying
Whenever Opalwing Cavalry attacks with one or more Vehicles, attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.rules_text: Create two 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens, then put a +1/+1 counter on each if you control a non-Construct token.
Sundering Strike deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If {C} was paid to cast this spell and that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Untap target creature. It gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. If it's a Vehicle, it gets an additional +1/+1.

Choose one –
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.
• Fragment target creature with mana value 3 or less. [i](Its controller creates a token that's a copy of it and puts a shard counter on both. Creatures with shard counters have base power and toughness 1/1 and can't be fragmented.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its triggered abilities don't trigger.
When 99CW enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less until 99CW leaves the battlefield.

Autopilot {1}{W} [i](You may pay a Vehicle's autopilot cost instead of crewing it.)[/i]
Oligarch's Supercar gets +2/+2 and has lifelink if it wasn't crewed this turn.
Crew 1
cards.flavor_text: [i]Ten years ago, Goldport stopped disclosing the distribution of its tax revenue.[/i]
cards.notes: 15 Jul 2025: Buffed cycle to give +2/+2 instead of +1/+1
